items.summary:
Amazon is offering the best off-season savings on the Greenworks 2300 PSI TruBrushless Electric Pressure Washer at $188.49 shipped, which beats out its direct pricing by $100. While it carries a $360 MSRP direct from Greenworks, it hasn’t been seen that high at Amazon since April, with it coming down from $288 here. Discounts up until now have gone as low as a one-time $189 back in July, with things keeping above $230 otherwise, but now you’re able to get a larger-than-ever $100 markdown off the going rate (and $172 off the MSRP) for the lowest price we have tracked.

items.title: EcoFlow’s final Xmas flash sale drops RIVER 2 Pro 768Wh power station to $299 low for 72-hours, more from $749
items.summary:
As the last addition to EcoFlow’s final Christmas Sale days, the brand has launched a 72-hour flash sale with up to 61% savings across four offers, starting with the RIVER 2 Pro Portable Power Station at $299 shipped, beating out its Amazon pricing by $16. Coming down from its $599 MSRP direct from the brand, and starting lower from $529 at Amazon, discounts kept the costs above $359 for much of the year, falling to $339 during October’s Prime Day event which ushered in further drops as low as $299. Now, through December 26, you can pick it up here with a $230 markdown off the going rate (and $300 off the MSRP) for the lowest price we have tracked. Head below to browse the full list of flash offers while they’re still around through the week.

items.title: Samsung Unveils 2026 Odyssey Gaming Monitors With 6K Resolution And 1040Hz Refresh Rate
items.summary:
